comments.content: Oh, no! Not Sarah Palin! You have made both Carl and I cringe at the same time. ;)

Ahhh, success :-)  
You didn't even mention "Curlz" for the typeface. I thought surely that someone would be annoyed by this as well ;^P

ChrisL

Stacey

Sorry, Stacie! The idea just popped into my head when I thought of something that would get a rise out of Terry--great minds (or mischievous minds) think alike!

ChrisL
I will try to think of something equally hilarious/cringe inducing.

_You didn’t even mention “Curlz” for the typeface. I thought surely that someone would be annoyed by this as well ;^P_
